item.title: NODES 2024: How to Submit a Technical Presentation
item.description: Photo credit There is no shortage of technical events such as conferences, meetups, trainings, hackathons, and so on. These events are a great way to learn new things, connect with people, and share knowledge with others. One of the most valuable and exciting ways to share knowledge is by giving a technical presentation. Today, we will look at how to submit a technical presentation for an event and get some personal recommendations from me, as well.
